member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.ToBinaryString
member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to a binary byte string. The prefix symbol (bit, byte, kibi, mebi, etc.) used is the largest prefix such that the corresponding value is greater than or equal to one.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.ToBinaryString(System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to a binary byte string. The prefix symbol (bit, byte, kibi, mebi, etc.) used is the largest prefix such that the corresponding value is greater than or equal to one. Use for decimal string representation.
member.param: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

member.summary: Minimum number of allowed bits in an instance.

member.summary: Maximum number of allowed bits in an instance.

member.name: P:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Bits
member.summary: Gets the number of bits represented by this object.

member.name: P:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Bytes
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes represented by this object.

member.name: P:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.LargestWholeNumberBinarySymbol
member.summary:
Gets the largest whole number binary symbol. Example:
- 1024 KiB will return MiB
- 1023 KiB will return KiB

member.name: P:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.LargestWholeNumberDecimalSymbol
member.summary:
Gets the largest whole number decimal symbol. Example:
- 1000 KB will return MB
- 999 KB will return KB

member.name: P:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.LargestWholeNumberBinaryValue
member.summary:
Gets the largest whole number binary value. Example:
- 1024 KiB will return 1
- 1023 KiB will return 1023

member.name: P:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.LargestWholeNumberDecimalValue
member.summary:
Gets the largest whole number decimal value. Example:
- 1000 KB will return 1
- 999 KB will return 999

member.summary: Converts the value of the current object to a decimal byte string. The prefix symbol (bit, byte, kilo, mega, etc.) used is the largest prefix such that the corresponding value is greater than or equal to one. Use for binary string representation.

to use binary byte values (1 KiB = 1024) instead of decimal values (1 KB = 1000 B).

member.summary: Indicates whether an instance has equal number of bits to this instance.

member.summary: Indicates whether an instance has equal number of bits to this instance.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.CompareTo(neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Compares this instance's bit count to the other instance's bit count.
member.returns:
A signed number indicating the relative values of this instance and other.
Negative return value: this instance is less than the one specified.
Zero return value: this instance is equal to the one specified.
Positive return value: this instance is greater than the one specified.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Add(neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Returns a new object whose value is the sum of the specified value and this instance.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.Subtract(neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Returns a new object whose value is the difference of the specified value and this instance.

member.summary: Returns an instance whose value is 1 byte greater than this instance.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_UnaryNegation(neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Returns a new instance whose value is the negative value of the specified instance.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_Decrement(neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Returns a new instance whose value is 1 byte less than this instance.

member.summary: Indicates whether two instances have different number of bits.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_LessThan(neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Indicates whether one instance has less bits than the other.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize.op_LessThanOrEqual(neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize,neXn.Lib.ByteSizeLib.ByteSize)
member.summary: Indicates whether one instance has less or equal bits than the other.

member.name: M:neXn.Lib.Hashes.CRC32Algo.Crc32Algorithm.Append(System.UInt32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Computes CRC-32 from multiple buffers. Call this method multiple times to chain multiple buffers.
member.param: Initial CRC value for the algorithm. It is zero for the first buffer. Subsequent buffers should have their initial value set to CRC value returned by previous call to this method.
Input buffer with data to be checksummed.
Offset of the input data within the buffer.
Length of the input data in the buffer.
member.returns: Accumulated CRC-32 of all buffers processed so far.

Input buffer containing data to be checksummed.
member.returns: Accumulated CRC-32 of all buffers processed so far.
